WorkItem.Summary: Array Formulae in PHPExcel don't work

Comments.Message: Are these supposed to be Array formulae?

"Don't work" doesn't really tell me anything.

Is the calculation throwing an error or an exception? If so what? 

Is it simply not returning the result you expect? If so, what do you expect? what do you get? what are the values of A2:A31, I2 and B2:B31?

Have you tried using the calculation engine debugger to identify at what point the calculation is failing?

Help me to help you.

not returning the result. i have table like this: 

A      B
1	72
1	79
1	71
1	83
2	77
2	79
2	67
2	73
 
I want to receive the median of values from the column "b" in these rows, in which the column "a" is 1, but I recive 0

This will work correctly (even in Excel) only as an array formula; and the PHPExcel calculation engine doesn't yet support array formulae. It's in the pipeline, part of my major rewrite of the calculation engine, but because it entials some significant structural changes to the cell definition it won't be available for a couple of releases, probably around Easter next year.
